project.description: This job is for EAS Upgrade Deployment.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: iso_binary_location
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Provide extracted EAS ISO Location e.g.: /home/eas_iso/EAS_5.2

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: ansible_host_file_location
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Provide the location of the ansible host file.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
for f in `ls $iso_binary_location/ISO/Portal/*.zip`; do echo "$f "; done temp="${f##*/}" ISO_Name=${temp%.*} echo "ISO Name: $ISO_Name"
echo "Extracting Portal" unzip -o $iso_binary_location/ISO/Portal/$ISO_Name.zip -d $iso_binary_location/ISO/Portal/
echo "Deploying Application" export ANSIBLE_HOST_KEY_CHECKING=False ansible-playbook -i $ansible_host_file_location/hosts ./AnsibleScripts/UpgradeDeployLinux.yaml -e iso_binary_location=$iso_binary_location/ISO/Portal/$ISO_Name -e java_file_location=$iso_binary_location/ISO/Utilities
